Maximum Package Weight (Please consult your shipping carrier for maximum supported shipping weight)
Additional Protection Configuration Value
field.comment: Used only when "Additional Protection Value" is set to "Configuration". Can contain only numeric amount.

field.label: Account ID
field.comment: Please make sure to use only digits here. No dashes are allowed.

field.label: Maximum Package Weight (Please consult your shipping carrier for maximum supported shipping weight)
Hub ID
field.comment: The field is applicable if the Smart Post method is selected.

Mode
field.comment: Enables/Disables SSL verification of Magento server by UPS.

Free Shipping with Minimum Order Amount

Handling Applied
field.comment: "Per Order" allows single handling fee for entire order. "Per Package" allows individual handling fee for each package.

field.label: Divide Order Weight
field.comment: Allows breaking total order weight into smaller pieces if it exeeds 70 kg to ensure accurate calculation of shipping charges.

field.label: Ready time
field.comment: Package ready time after order submission (in hours)
